page.title: 01Our Domesday Block.
page.content: Our Domesday block covers a twelve kilometre block in South West Wales. The children in J2 and J3 have been involved in the project. Ours is a rural area,the greater part of it is farmland and inland water.The estuary of the River Loughor takes a great deal of our square while the town of Gowerton and parts of Kingsbridge,Garden Village,Loughor and Gorseinon also come under our block. The town of Gowerton is the gateway to the beautiful countryside and leisure activities of the Gower peninsula.The area is densely populated in the summer months with visitors from all over Britain and Europe also. The area is rich in Welsh culture and Welsh language is spoken as a first language here.Our school is a Welsh medium school which helps this.
